docs.title: Open the AI Context Window with UltraRepo
Got Massive Code or Document Archives?
docs.text:
UltraRepo RAG builds advanced Knowledge Graphs from your source code, documents, or unstructured data — giving AI Agents the context they need to rapidly learn, infer and to reason intelligently. Open the AI Context Window to infinity and beyond!

No need to upload gigabytes of code into LLM memory — let Graph RAG do the heavy lifting.

docs.title: Why Choose UltraRepo RAG?
docs.text:
• ✨ AI Agent Discoverable Code, Content, Data provides accuracy with no limits
  • 📦 Graph RAG transforms code, docs, and data into an intelligent knowledge base
  • 🧠 Optimized for hybrid symbolic + semantic search with Neo4j and Qdrant
  • 🔐 Local, secure, and offline-ready for privacy-sensitive applications

For more information, visit UltraRepo.com

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Welcome to the UltraRepo Graph RAG project! Follow these steps to get up and running:

docs.title: 2. Install Dependencies
docs.text:
Make sure you have Python and pip installed. Then run:

pip install -r requirements.txt

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
